title: Chat app
description: Chat app powered by Ruby on Rails and React with websockets. The app was developed for me to strengthen my knowledge of Ruby on Rails and React.

title: Toki
description: Work in progress rendering engine writen with C++ and the Vulkan rendering API.

I'm trying to make a mini game engine from scratch with just a few dependencies. The end goal of the is to able to create 2D/3D games with the application and package them, like you can see with games made with commerical engines.
The project is a continuation of my bachelor's thesis project.

title: Web store
description: Web store implementation, using Ruby on Rails. The purpose of the project was to strenghten my knowledge of Ruby on Rails.

title: Post site
description: Simple fullstack app written in Go where users can post posts. Project was meant primarily for learning Go.

title: Bucket list
description: Angular frontend app, used for displaying cloud buckets and files that they contain.
No actual API is used for this project.

title: Movies and Actors
description: Backend .NET application with multiple webservices, created for consolidating my knowledge of Docker and .Net.

title: Book your barber
description: Angular frontend app, used for booking a barber.

title: Simple OAuth2 server
description: Fullstack Ruby on Rails server which implements an OAuth2 authentication.

title: Pokedex
description: Frontend React app, which shows pokemon stats, moves and abilities.
